content: I have no special talent. I am only passionately curious.
Wisely, and slow. They stumble that run fast.
If you judge people, you have no time to love them.
All that we are is the result of what we have thought.
The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud.
Stay hungry, stay foolish.
The greatest wealth is to live content with little.
The future belongs to those who prepare for it today.
The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
A great man is always willing to be little.
Don’t count the days, make the days count.
In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.
Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
The root of suffering is attachment.
Well done is better than well said.
It always seems impossible until it’s done.
The unexamined life is not worth living.
Our life is frittered away by detail… simplify, simplify.
Try not to become a man of success but rather to become a man of value.
The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
No matter who you are or what you look like, how you started off, or how and who you love, America is a place where you can write your own destiny.
Turn your wounds into wisdom.
I don’t think of all the misery but of the beauty that still remains.
Life is a flower of which love is the honey.
Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
Little by little, one travels far. J.R.R.
It’s not how much you have that makes people look up to you, it’s who you are.
I fear not the man who has practiced 10,000 kicks once, but I fear the man who has practiced one kick 10,000 times.
A man who stands for nothing will fall for anything.
You have power over your mind – not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
I have a dream that one day little black boys and girls will be holding hands with little white boys and girls.
Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it’s better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.
The path to success is to take massive, determined action.
Love the life you live. Live the life you love.
God helps those that help themselves.
By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
I came, I saw, I conquered.
I think, therefore I am.
To be, or not to be, that is the question.
That’s one small step for a man, one giant leap for mankind.
The only thing that interferes with my learning is my education.
Ask not what your country can do for you, but what you can do for your country. John F.
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
Early to bed and early to rise makes a man healthy, wealthy, and wise.
Family is the most important thing in the world.
All I was doing was trying to get home from work.
The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
I’ve failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.
Float like a butterfly, sting like a bee.
Nonviolence is a weapon of the strong.
It does not matter how slowly you go so long as you do not stop.
Not how long, but how well you have lived is the main thing.
It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
You miss 100 percent of the shots you never take.
Peace begins with a smile.
You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
Life is either a daring adventure, or nothing.
Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
Good artists copy, great artists steal.
Genius is one percent inspiration, ninety-nine percent perspiration. Thomas A.
That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
If you think you can do a thing or think you can’t do a thing, you’re right.
Better to die standing than to live on your knees.
Big Brother is watching you.
Keep calm and carry on.
Genius is eternal patience.
No.
Fear is stupid. So are regrets.
Do something worth remembering.
Elegance is refusal.
Whatever you are, be a good one.
Puns are the highest form of literature.
A boo is a lot louder than a cheer.
Get busy living, or get busy dying.
I’m not afraid of dying, I’m afraid of not trying.
Be proud of who you are.
Not all those who wander are lost. J.R.R.
Better to build a bridge than a wall.
Be the hero of your own story.
The only failure is not to try.
Nobody can hurt me without my permission.
I am the greatest, I said that even before I knew I was.
Winners never quit, and quitters never win.
Man – a being in search of meaning.
Your past does not equal your future.
Believe you can and you’re halfway there.
I don’t make music for eyes. I make music for ears.
Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
We need fantasy to survive reality.
It’s fun to do the impossible.
Have no fear of perfection, you’ll never reach it.
What worries you, masters you.
There is nothing impossible to him who will try.
Whatever you do, do with all your might.
The future starts today, not tomorrow.
You are what you believe yourself to be.
Stumbling is not falling.
The best way to predict your future is to create it.
Those who dare to fail miserably can achieve greatly. John F.
If not us, who? If not now, when? John F.
Starting today, we must pick ourselves up, dust ourselves off, and begin again the work of remaking America.
It is you, the young and fearless at heart, the most diverse and educated generation in our history, who the nation is waiting to follow.
Ambition is a dream with a V8 engine.
Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the next moment.
When our memories outweigh our dreams, it is then that we become old.
We are all of us stars, and we deserve to twinkle.
For beautiful eyes, look for the good in others; for beautiful lips, speak only words of kindness; and for poise, walk with the knowledge that you are never alone.
I am basically a feminist. I think that women can do anything they decide to do.
Do all the good you can, for all the people you can, in all the ways you can, as long as you can.
Never doubt yourself. Never change who you are. Don’t care what people think and just go for it.
Power is not given to you. You have to take it.
Don’t settle for what life gives you; make life better and build something.

Everybody wants to be famous, but nobody wants to do the work. I live by that. You grind hard so you can play hard. At the end of the day, you put all the work in, and eventually it’ll pay off. It could be in a year, it could be in 30 years. Eventually, your hard work will pay off.
Everything negative – pressure, challenges – is all an opportunity for me to rise.
I like criticism. It makes you strong.
We don’t want to tell our dreams. We want to show them.

Impossible is just a big word thrown around by small men who find it easier to live in the world they’ve been given than to explore the power they have to change it. Impossible is not a fact. It’s an opinion. Impossible is not a declaration. It’s a dare. Impossible is potential. Impossible is temporary. Impossible is nothing.
If people take anything from my music, it should be motivation to know that anything is possible as long as you keep working at it and don’t back down.
Creativity is intelligence having fun.
I just don’t want to be hampered by my own limitations.
Those who say it can’t be done are usually interrupted by others doing it.
Do what you have to do, to do what you want to do.
I have learned over the years that when one’s mind is made up, this diminishes fear; knowing what must be done does away with fear.
The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
If I have seen further than others, it is by standing upon the shoulders of giants.
One day, in retrospect, the years of struggle will strike you as the most beautiful.
Learn to value yourself, which means: to fight for your happiness.
You’ll never find a rainbow if you’re looking down.
I would like to die on Mars. Just not on impact.
I don’t care what you think of me. I don’t think of you at all.
No man has a good enough memory to be a successful liar.
If you let your head get too big, it’ll break your neck.
Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.
Fame is like caviar, you know — it’s good to have caviar but not when you have it at every meal.
The best things in life are free. The second best things are very expensive.
I don’t have a short temper, I just have a quick reaction to bullshit.
Those who believe in telekinetics, raise my hand.
I have made this letter longer than usual because I lack the time to make it shorter.
Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much.
Always roll up the sleeves on your shirt. It gives the impression that you’re working, even if you’re not.
The scruffier your beard, the sharper you need to dress.
I am simple, complex, generous, selfish, unattractive, beautiful, lazy, and driven.
Being president is like running a cemetery: you’ve got a lot of people under you and nobody’s listening.
If you can’t convince them, confuse them. Harry S.
We are all born ignorant, but one must work hard to remain stupid.
I became insane, with long intervals of horrible sanity.
You laugh at me because I’m different I laugh at you because you’re all the same.
If you don’t have any shadows you’re not in the light.
Better a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without.
Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.
Often it isn’t the mountains ahead that wear you out, it’s the little pebble in your shoe.
Truth is like the sun. You can shut it out for a time, but it ain’t goin’ away.
Too often we enjoy the comfort of opinion without the discomfort of thought. John F.
No one ever told me I was pretty when I was a little girl. All little girls should be told they’re pretty, even if they aren’t.
It is easier to find men who will volunteer to die, than to find those who are willing to endure pain with patience.
Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
The biggest adventure you can ever take is to live the life of your dreams.
Nothing makes a woman more beautiful than the belief that she is beautiful.
Your love makes me strong. Your hate makes me unstoppable.
A lion doesn’t concern himself with the opinions of the sheep.
My ruthless desire to win at all costs served me well on the bike but the level it went to, for whatever reason, is a flaw. That desire, that attitude, that arrogance.
I’m for truth, no matter who tells it. I’m for justice, no matter who it’s for or against.
I never thought of myself as being handsome or good-looking or whatever. I always felt like an outsider.
Behind every successful person lies a pack of haters.
Hurt me with the truth. Don’t comfort me with a lie.
It’s easy to fool the eye but it’s hard to fool the heart.
It is our choices, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities. J.K.
Stand for something or you will fall for anything. Today’s mighty oak is yesterday’s nut that held its ground.
The truth will set you free, but first it will piss you off.
Every man is guilty of all the good he did not do.
In life you need either inspiration or desperation.
Man was born free, and he is everywhere in chains.
It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves.
Wise men talk because they have something to say; fools, because they have to say something.
We must use time as a tool, not as a couch. John F.
Simplicity is the keynote of all true elegance.
Some day you will be old enough to start reading fairy tales again. C.S.
Once you’ve accepted your flaws, no one can use them against you. George R.R.
The most important things are the hardest to say, because words diminish them.
You should never take more than you give.
Take a long pause …breathe and know that things are happening for you not to you.
It’s nice to be important, but it’s also important to be nice. Never forget that.
Be careful how you judge people, most of all friends. You don’t sum up a man’s life in one moment.
You never really learn much from hearing yourself speak.
Doubt can motivate you, so don’t be afraid of it. Confidence and doubt are at two ends of the scale, and you need both. They balance each other out.
Life imposes things on you that you can’t control, but you still have the choice of how you’re going to live through this.
A wise man can play the part of a clown, but a clown can’t play the part of a wise man.
Insanity: doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results.
A wise man can learn more from a foolish question than a fool can learn from a wise answer.
I don’t care that they stole my idea… I care that they don’t have any of their own.
A fool thinks himself to be wise, but a wise man knows himself to be a fool.
Someone’s sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.
Truth is ever to be found in simplicity, and not in the multiplicity and confusion of things.
To know that we know what we know, and to know that we do not know what we do not know, that is true knowledge.
There is nothing so useless as doing efficiently that which should not be done at all.
People are more impressed by the power of our example rather than the example of our power.
Honesty is the first chapter in the book of wisdom.
Doubt is not a pleasant condition, but certainty is absurd.
Science is organized knowledge. Wisdom is organized life.
Do not pray for easy lives, pray to be stronger men. John F.
Life is never easy. There is work to be done and obligations to be met – obligations to truth, to justice, and to liberty. John F.
If I’d observed all the rules, I’d never got anywhere.
Two roads diverged in a wood, and I took the one less traveled by, and that has made all the difference.
Be thankful for what you have; you’ll end up having more. If you concentrate on what you don’t have, you will never, ever have enough.
When you are happy you can forgive a great deal.
Mistakes are the price of an interesting life.
My life didn’t please me, so I created my life.
Elegance is when the inside is as beautiful as the outside.
The road to success is not easy to navigate, but with hard work, drive and passion, it’s possible to achieve the American dream.
Live for each second without hesitation.
What is drama, after all, but life with the dull bits cut out.
Be cool to people. Be nice to as many people as you can. Smile to as many people as you can, and have them smile back at you.
I’m an all-or-nothing kind of person, and when I become interested in something, I give it my all.
There is no happiness. There is only concentration.
It’s not about an opening weekend. It’s about a career, building a set of films you’re proud of. Period.
Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
To live happily is an inward power of the soul.
Confidence is contagious. So is a lack of confidence.
The thing to do is enjoy the ride while you’re on it.
The formula of happiness and success is just being actually yourself, in the most vivid possible way you can.
Happiness lies in the joy of achievement and the thrill of creative effort. Franklin D.
Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.
A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
God gave us the gift of life; it is up to us to give ourselves the gift of living well.
You can discover more about a person in an hour of play than in a year of conversation.
Life is really simple, but men insist on making it complicated.
Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.
You cannot find peace by avoiding life.
We are what we repeatedly do; excellence, then, is not an act but a habit.
Before anything else, preparation is the key to success.
If you’re walking down the right path and you’re willing to keep walking, eventually you’ll make progress.
Every accomplishment starts with the decision to try. John F.
Efforts and courage are not enough without purpose and direction. John F.
A wise girl knows her limits, a smart girl knows that she has none.
I did not run for this job just to warm the seat. I desperately want to make a difference.
If you work hard and meet your responsibilities, you can get ahead, no matter where you come from, what you look like or who you love.
Success isn’t about how much money you make. It’s about the difference you make in people’s lives.
Laziness may appear attractive, but work gives satisfaction.
It had long since come to my attention that people of accomplishment rarely sat back and let things happen to them. They went out and happened to things.
Don’t pay any attention to what they write about you. Just measure it in inches.
To be successful you have to be selfish, or else you never achieve. And once you get to your highest level, then you have to be unselfish. Stay reachable. Stay in touch. Don’t isolate.
That was my way of getting through difficult times of low confidence – hard work.
I don’t have to show anything to anyone. There is nothing to prove.
Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing or learning to do.
If I make a fool of myself, who cares? I’m not frightened by anyone’s perception of me.
Success is most often achieved by those who don’t know that failure is inevitable.
I felt like it was time to set up my future, so I set a goal. My goal was independence.
You learn more in failure than you ever do in success.
I don’t believe that old cliche that good things come to those who wait. I think good things come to those who want something so bad they can’t sit still.
I had to stop going to auditions thinking, ‘Oh, I hope they like me.’ I had to go in thinking I was the answer to their problem.
If you have no critics you’ll likely have no success.
If there is no struggle, there is no progress.
You must never be fearful about what you are doing when it is right.
Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
Football is like life – it requires perseverance, self-denial, hard work, sacrifice, dedication and respect for authority.
I became an overachiever to get approval from the world.
Don’t think money does everything or you are going to end up doing everything for money.
Most people fail in life because they major in minor things.
Ignore all hatred and criticism. Live for what you create, and die protecting it.
Winning is not always the barometer of getting better.
Success isn’t always about greatness. It’s about consistency. Consistent hard work leads to success. Greatness will come.
By prevailing over all obstacles and distractions, one may unfailingly arrive at his chosen goal or destination.
I pay no attention whatever to anybody’s praise or blame. I simply follow my own feelings.
An artist is someone who has learned to trust in himself.
Ceaseless work, analysis, reflection, writing much, endless self-correction, that is my secret.
The finest steel has to go through the hottest fire. Richard M.
No one has ever become poor by giving.
The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
There is a time for work, and a time for love. That leaves no other time.
If you haven’t cried, your eyes can’t be beautiful.
A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.
As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest form of appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them. John F.
I don’t go by the rule book… I lead from the heart, not the head.
I’m selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I’m out of control, and at times hard to handle. But if you can’t handle me at my worst, then you don’t deserve me at my best.
Be true to your work, your word, and your friend.
Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
It’s all about hope, kindness and a connection with one another.

Vulnerability is the essence of romance. It’s the art of being uncalculated, the willingness to look foolish, the courage to say, ‘This is me, and I’m interested in you enough to show you my flaws with the hope that you may embrace me for all that I am but, more important, all that I am not.
Love is just a word, but you bring it definition.
Love doesn’t ask why, speaks from the heart, and never explains.
You can’t blame gravity for falling in love.
There is only one happiness in life – to love and to be loved.
Love is a promise; love is a souvenir, once given never forgotten, never let it disappear.
A simple ‘I love you’ means more than money.
The course of true love never did run smooth.
All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn’t hurt. Charles M.
You can’t live your life for other people. You’ve got to do what’s right for you, even if it hurts some people you love.
The best love is the kind that awakens the soul; that makes us reach for more; that plants a fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds.
Love is a serious mental disease.
The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched – they must be felt with the heart.
My religion is very simple. My religion is kindness.
At the end of the day, you won’t be happy until you love yourself.
Let us dream of tomorrow where we can truly love from the soul, and know love as the ultimate truth at the heart of all creation.
You know you’re in love when you can’t fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams. Dr.
Better to have loved and lost, than to have never loved at all.
And know that I am with you always; yes, to the end of time.
Kindness is a mark of faith, and whoever has not kindness has not faith.
Where there is love there is life.
The greatest pleasure of life is love.
A friend is one soul abiding in two bodies.
No one is useless in this world who lightens the burdens of another.
I feel that there is nothing more truly artistic than to love people.
A leader is a dealer in hope.
We are twice armed if we fight with faith.
Only the wisest and stupidest of men never change.
We can do anything we want to if we stick to it long enough.
If you don’t like something, change it. If you can’t change it, change your attitude.
We have the power to make this the best generation of mankind in the history of the world or make it the last. John F.

Hope is the bedrock of this nation. The belief that our destiny will not be written for us, but by us, by all those men and women who are not content to settle for the world as it is, who have the courage to remake the world as it should be.
How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.
We all do better when we work together. Our differences do matter, but our common humanity matters more.
Will our children ask, “why didn’t you act?”.
au_name: Or ask, “How did you find the moral courage to rise up and change?” Al Gore

content: Remember, hope is a good thing, maybe the best of things.
I’m continually trying to make choices that put me against my own comfort zone. As long as you’re uncomfortable, it means you’re growing.
You’ve got enemies? Good, that means you actually stood up for something.
From the beginning, it wasn’t about the ends. It was about busting raps and standing for something.
Nobody can give you freedom. Nobody can give you equality or justice or anything. If you’re a man, you take it.
You have to wake the people up first, then you’ll get action.
Not everything that is faced can be changed, but nothing can be changed until it is faced.
Don’t aspire to make a living, aspire to make a difference.
I would like to be remembered as a person who wanted to be free… so other people would be also free.
Faith consists in believing when it is beyond the power of reason to believe.
A lot of people are afraid to say what they want. That’s why they don’t get what they want.
If you wanna make the world a better place, take a look at yourself, then make that change.
The philosophers have only interpreted the world, in various ways. The point, however, is to change it.
This is the mark of a really admirable man: steadfastness in the face of trouble.
The greatest leader is not necessarily the one who does the greatest things. He is the one that gets the people to do the greatest things.
The biggest risk is not taking any risk… In a world that changing really quickly, the only strategy that is guaranteed to fail is not taking risks.
Who cares about winning? We should focus on serving.
In times of rapid change, experience could be your worst enemy. J.
If you want to make enemies, try to change something.
Hope is a good breakfast, but it is a bad supper.
One child, one teacher, one book, one pen can change the world.
The highest result of education is tolerance.
Experience is the teacher of all things.
It is better to create than to learn! Creating is the essence of life.
In the new economy, information, education and motivation are everything.
Always aim high, work hard, and care deeply about what you believe in.
Leadership and learning are indispensable to each other. John F.
Being hardworking is the best thing you can show children.
It is easier to build strong children than to repair broken men.
Practice does not make perfect. Only perfect practice makes perfect.
Be alone, that is the secret of invention; be alone, that is when ideas are born.
The mind, once stretched by a new idea, never returns to its original dimensions.
In order to write about life first you must live it.
Judge a man by his questions rather than his answers.
Life isn’t about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
Never discourage anyone who continually makes progress, no matter how slow.
Tell me and I forget. Teach me and I remember. Involve me and I learn.
Who is wise? He that learns from every one.
An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
Dost thou love life? Then do not squander time, for that is the stuff life is made of.
Real knowledge is to know the extent of one’s ignorance.
Don’t you ever let a soul in the world tell you that you can’t be exactly who you are.
The greatest education in the world is watching the masters at work.
The big lesson in life, baby, is never be scared of anyone or anything.
Education begins the gentleman, but reading, good company and reflection must finish him.
Even if I knew that tomorrow the world would go to pieces, I would still plant my apple tree.
When you can’t make them see the light, make them feel the heat.
You cannot teach a man anything; you can only help him find it within himself.
The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only a page.
au_name: Augustine of Hippo (See also: book quotes)

content: Curious that we spend more time congratulating people who have succeeded than encouraging people who have not.
There is no greater education than one that is self-driven.
You are the bows from which your children as living arrows are sent forth.
You should learn from your competitor, but never copy. Copy and you die.
It’s what you learn after you know it all that counts.
Hasta la vista, baby.
I’ll be back.
Salvation lies within.
Hope is a good thing, maybe the best of things, and no good thing ever dies.
I guess it comes down to a simple choice, really. Get busy living or get busy dying.
Elementary, my dear Watson.
I am your father.
May the Force be with you.
Chewie, we’re home.
Help me, Obi-Wan Kenobi. You’re my only hope.
May the Force be with you.
You wasted $150,000 on an education you coulda got for $1.50 in late fees at the public library.
You’ll have bad times, but it’ll always wake you up to the good stuff you weren’t paying attention to.
Going in one more round when you don’t think you can. That’s what makes all the difference in your life.
Wax on, wax off.
Life’s simple. You make choices and you don’t look back.
The most important thing in life will always be the people in this room. Right here, right now.
I’m having an old friend for dinner.
Houston, we have a problem.
Life is like a box of chocolates. You never know what you’re going to get.
I don’t want to survive. I want to live.
Frankly, my dear, I don’t give a damn.
The name’s Bond. James Bond.
I’m going to make him an offer he can’t refuse.
Keep your friends close, but your enemies closer.
Here’s looking at you, kid.
There’s no place like home.
Roads? Where we’re going we don’t need roads.
You’re gonna need a bigger boat.
Love means never having to say you’re sorry.
When you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.
You get what you settle for.
The things you own end up owning you.
Advertising has us chasing cars and clothes, working jobs we hate so we can buy shit we don’t need.
We buy things we don’t need, to impress people we don’t like.
It’s only after we’ve lost everything that we’re free to do anything.
Change will not come if we wait for some other person or some other time. We are the ones we’ve been waiting for. We are the change that we seek.
